title: The Best Video Game Kings + Shovel Knight: King of Cards
description: In this episode of The Besties, the boys debate which are the very best video game kings of all time. They'll also dive in to the latest addition to the Shovel Knight franchise, King of Cards.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
content:encoded: In this episode of The Besties, the boys debate which are the very best video game kings of all time. They'll also dive in to the latest addition to the Shovel Knight franchise, King of Cards.
